snippet.title: Book of Park Records
snippet.description: Mordecai and Rigby tamper with Benson's official Book of Park Records. Watch Regular Show on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: The Bottom of the Mystery
snippet.description: The gang reviews what they know about the evil thing buried beneath Crystal Cove. Watch more Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Show Writer
snippet.description: Garfield talks to the show writer about funny stuff. Watch more of The Garfield Show on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Sounds Count
snippet.description: Rigby goes to Skips for help but discovers more rules about jinxing. Watch Regular Show on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Fake Apology
snippet.description: A user writes in about a friend who always apologizes but still acts mean.

snippet.title: Fixing a Friendship
snippet.description: A user writes in asking how to fix a friendship that has run into some problems.

snippet.title: Gumball - Behind the Scenes: Creating Comedy
snippet.description: Series Director Mic Graves and Series Creator Ben Bocquelet take us behind the scenes and tell us all about writing comedy for the show's second season.

snippet.title: Ice King's in Trouble
snippet.description: Ice King asks Marceline to help him write a song. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Online Privacy
snippet.description: An adult finds her 14-year-old niece writing inappropriate posts online and wants to help the situation without betraying her niece's privacy.

snippet.title: Remember You
snippet.description: Marceline and Ice King use the pages of Simon Petrikov's journal to write a song about their former life together. Watch more Adventure Time on Cartoon Network!
